data.title: Reviews of Philip K. Dick Award Winners
data.text:
This is a list of Philip K. Dick Award winners, including ratings for those books that I've read and links to reviews where I've written one. This is a judged award awarded for the best original SF paperback published in the US. Only paperback and trade paperback originals are eligible, not books that were originally published in hardcover.

The date given on this page is the year that the award was given, since I standardize all awards to the year of the award. It will therefore be one year later than the official date on the award, which reflects publication date.

2024 Bethany Jacobs These Burning Stars 2023 Kimberly Unger The Extractionist 2022 Kali Wallace Dead Space 2021 Alison Stine The Road Out of Winter 2020 Sarah Pinsker Sooner or Later Everything Falls Into the Sea 2019 Audrey Schulman Theory of Bastards 2018 Carrie Vaughn Bannerless 2017 Claudia Casper The Mercy Journals 2016 Ramez Naam Apex 2015 Meg Elison The Book of the Unnamed Midwife 2014 Ben H. Winters Countdown City 2013 Brian Francis Slattery Lost Everything 2012 Simon Morden Equations of Life 2012 Simon Morden Theories of Flight 2012 Simon Morden Degrees of Freedom 2011 Mark Hodder The Strange Affair of Springheel Jack 2010 C.L. Anderson Bitter Angels 7 out of 10 2009 Adam-Troy Castro Emissaries from the Dead 7 out of 10 2009 David Walton Terminal Mind 2008 M. John Harrison Nova Swing 2007 Chris Moriarty Spin Control 9 out of 10 2006 M.M. Buckner War Surf 2005 Gwyneth Jones Life 2004 Richard K. Morgan Altered Carbon 7 out of 10 2003 Carol Emshwiller The Mount 7 out of 10 2002 Richard Paul Russo Ship of Fools 2001 Michael Marshall Smith Only Forward 9 out of 10 2000 Stephen Baxter Vacuum Diagrams 1999 Geoff Ryman 253: The Print Remix 1998 Stepan Chapman The Troika 1997 Stephen Baxter The Time Ships 4 out of 10 1996 Bruce Bethke Headcrash 1995 Robert Charles Wilson Mysterium 1994 Jack Womack Elvissey 1994 John M. Ford Growing Up Weightless 8 out of 10 1993 Richard Grant Through the Heart 1992 Ian McDonald King of Morning, Queen of Day 1991 Pat Murphy Points of Departure 1990 Richard Paul Russo Subterranean Gallery 1989 Paul J. McAuley 400 Billion Stars 1989 Rudy Rucker Wetware 1988 Patricia Geary Strange Toys 1987 James P. Blaylock Homunculus 1986 Tim Powers Dinner at Deviant's Palace 1985 William Gibson Neuromancer 7 out of 10 1984 Tim Powers The Anubis Gates 1983 Rudy Rucker Software 3 out of 10

Ratings for books that don't have a review are based on my memory of the book. The rating may well change if I get a chance to read the book again.
